---
id: claim-pending-workflow-node-runs
title: "Claim pending workflow node runs"
description: "Claim pending workflow node runs for processing. Claimed runs will not appear from this endpoint until their visibility timeout expires."
sidebar_label: "Claim pending workflow node runs"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import Translate from "@docusaurus/Translate";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Claim pending workflow node runs"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/org/{org_id}/workflows/runs/claim-pending"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Claim pending workflow node runs for processing. Claimed runs will not appear from this endpoint until their visibility timeout expires.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","name":"org_id","description":"The unique identifier of the organization.","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"installationId":{"type":"string","description":"The unique identifier of the installation claiming the runs."},"limit":{"type":"integer","description":"Maximum number of node runs to claim (1-100).","minimum":1,"maximum":100},"visibilityTimeoutMs":{"type":"integer","description":"Time in milliseconds before claimed runs become visible again if not acknowledged.","minimum":1000,"maximum":600000}},"required":["installationId"]}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Default Response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"ok":{"type":"boolean"},"nodeRuns":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"identifier":{"type":"string","pattern":"^wfnr_[a-zA-Z0-9]{16}$"},"nodeTitle":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"nodeIcon":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"nodeConfigType":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"output":{"default":{},"type":"object","additionalProperties":{}},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["COMPLETED","IN_PROGRESS"]},"result":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"createdAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"updatedAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"completedAt":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"nodeRunLogs":{"default":[],"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"logLevel":{"type":"string","enum":["DEBUG","INFO","WARN","ERROR"]},"log":{"default":"","type":"string"},"tags":{"default":{},"type":"object","additionalProperties":{"type":"string"}},"createdAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"updatedAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}},"required":["logLevel","log","tags","createdAt","updatedAt"],"additionalProperties":false}},"pendingExecution":{"type":"boolean","nullable":true},"claimedUntil":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"installationId":{"type":"string","nullable":true}},"required":["identifier","output","status","createdAt","updatedAt","nodeRunLogs"],"additionalProperties":false}}},"required":["ok","nodeRuns"],"additionalProperties":false}}}},"404":{"description":"Default Response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"ok":{"type":"boolean"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"}},"required":["ok","error"],"additionalProperties":false}}}},"500":{"description":"Default Response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"ok":{"type":"boolean"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"}},"required":["ok","error"],"additionalProperties":false}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
